answers.answer: Yup! I got it around week 28. Its diet controlled so I just watch what I eat. Sometimes if my sugars are good ill treat myself but overall everything is good and baby is on track! Im 33w5d now and ive actually lost a few pounds which im happy with. I take my blood 3-4times a day 2 hours after I eat yeah definitely don't look into the Internet because they have just extreme cases when it's really something that can be treated by how you eat and seeing how your body reacts to certain foods good luck

I'm 23 weeks. Diagnosed 4 weeks ago.I had it with my son and he had some jaundice when he was born so we had 2 stay in hospital for a week and a bit until his blood tests came back clear. He's now a perfectly healthy preschooler.Oh. He did come early which could have been due to gd.

question: Hey just found out i have gestational diabetes would like to know how those that have it are doing. I dont know much about it so just curious about the experience, especially the birthing experience. The internet is full of garbage info.  I would like to here from those actually going thru it or have gone thru it
title: any moms with Gest. daibetes?
